Features Pre-packed In Our TikTok Clone Script

Login/Sign Up

Your users can use their phone number, email address or social media accounts for registering themselves with the app. These credentials can be used for logging into the app.

Profile Management

Users can use details like their name, contact info, photo, and more for creating, managing, and editing their profiles.

Privacy Settings

The privacy settings of users can be changed as per their requirements. The uploaded video can be shared only with followers or the general public.

Home

This section appears after logging onto the app and lists down all the other pages for easy accessibility.

Video Creation

Videos can be created by users for expressing talents like enacting popular movie clips or lip-syncing to popular audio files available in the app.

Video Discovery

Videos shared by other users can also be searched via hashtags or by specifically typing the video title.

Video Viewing

This video-sharing platform allows users to watch the videos shared by others. They can like, comment, and share it with others. Information like the location of the video and other tagged users can also be viewed from the video.

Video Posting

The videos created over this platform can be posted by users along with hashtags, descriptions, etc. Other app users and locations can also be tagged in the videos.

Video Filters

Various available filters can also be applied to the videos before sharing them on the user profiles. The filters can enhance the visual effects of videos and make them look more professional.

Video Comments

Other users can comment on your video and vice versa. This helps in improving video content as users come to know what others feel about their work.

In-app Push notifications

These notifications inform users whenever new content is posted by people and hashtags they follow.

Favorite Sounds

Interesting soundtracks can be saved by users in their profiles and used for video creation in the future.

View Post

Posts shared by others can be both viewed and liked over the app platform.

View User Profile

Both profiles and videos of other users can be viewed easily using this app. Users can even like, share, and follow the profiles they find entertaining.

Settings

Users can opt for various settings options for managing their profiles like viewing app content, profile sharing with others, etc.

Customizable Features of our TikTok Clone

Dubbing & Video Selfie

Users can record custom audio-dubbed video performances easily by banking on this feature.

Audio Selection

Users can either upload original tracks or choose from their favorite segments for creating an audio-visual Dubsmash post.

Create Your Own Channel

Be it ‘friends only’ or the ‘public’ at large, users can easily create and manage their channel according to their target audience. Once the channel is created, the users can regularly share content for further engagement.

Stickers

Be it music-dubbed video or plain media, users can share it all on their own or a friend’s profile through stickers, texts, etc for adding to the unique flair of their content.

News Feed

The news feed of users gets constantly updated with the latest posts shared by the channels or profiles they follow depending upon their preferences.

Multi Picture or Video Sharing

Both dubbed music video and media content can be shared by users under set categories either on their own profile or on the profile of fellow users or popular social media channels for garnering more views.

Group Chat

Groups can be created by app users with others where they can exchange messages and media content like pictures and videos.

Media Attachment

Users of the app can easily share music-dubbed videos and pictures with groups, specific users, or social media profiles.

Report User

Suspicious profiles, users, and channels can be reported by users for maintaining the quality of content shared over the platform.
